data.title: (THE MARVIN STAMM QUARTET ALONE TOGETHER)
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Made-for-TV programme or made-for-video/DVD release.   Feature film (over 60 minutes).   "Alone together" by Howard Dietz, Arthur Schwartz; "Come out and play" by Rufus Reid; "Invitation" by Paul Francis Webster, Bronislau Kaper; "Baubles, bangles and beads" by Robert Wright, George Forrest; "Lagrima agradecida", "Fun house" by Bill Mays; "When she looks at me", "'T's butter"  by Marvin Stamm. (Songs).   The Marvin Stamm Quartet:- Marvin Stamm, trumpet, fluegel horn; Bill Mays, piano; Rufus Reid, acoustic double bass; Ed Soph, drums. (Personnel On Camera).   Recorded on 5th November 2006 at Rising Jazz Stars, Beverly Hills.   Motion Picture (Form).
